title: User Registration - Successful
description: Verify that a user can successfully register with valid information and that the account is created securely.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid user details including email, username, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Check that the registration is successful and confirmation is shown.
Verify that user data is securely stored in the backend.

title: User Registration - Input Validation Failures
description: Verify the registration form validates input and shows correct error messages for invalid or missing fields.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Submit registration with empty fields.
Check error messages for required fields appear.
Submit registration with invalid email format.
Check for appropriate email validation error message.
Submit registration with weak password.
Check for password strength error message.

title: User Login - Successful
description: Verify that a registered user can login successfully with correct credentials and session is established.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid registered email and password.
Submit the login form.
Verify login is successful and the user is redirected to the chat interface.
Verify JWT token is received and stored securely in the client.

title: User Login - Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails if the user enters incorrect email or password and shows an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid email but incorrect password.
Submit the login form.
Verify login fails and an error message is displayed.
Enter unregistered email.
Submit the login form.
Verify login fails and an error message is displayed for user not found.

title: Password Reset Flow - Successful
description: Verify that a user can request a password reset, receive an email, and successfully change their password.

steps.description: Navigate to the password reset page.
Submit a registered email for password reset.
Verify that a password reset email is sent to the registered email.
Click the link in the password reset email.
Enter a new valid password and confirm.
Submit the password reset form.
Verify password is updated and user can login with the new password.

title: Password Reset Flow - Invalid Email Entry
description: Verify that submitting an unregistered email during password reset request shows the appropriate error.

steps.description: Navigate to the password reset page.
Submit an unregistered email for password reset.
Verify an error message shown indicating no account found with that email.

title: AI Chat Interface - Prompt Submission and Streaming Responses
description: Verify that the AI chat interface accepts user prompts, displays a streaming AI-generated response in real-time, and enables new prompt submission after completion.

steps.description: Login as an authenticated user and navigate to the AI chat interface.
Enter a valid prompt in the input control.
Submit the prompt.
Verify the AI response begins streaming immediately and updates dynamically.
Verify the prompt input is disabled during streaming and re-enabled after response completes.

title: AI Chat Interface - Chat History Persistence
description: Verify that chat history is saved securely and remains accessible across user sessions and page refreshes.

steps.description: Login and submit multiple prompts in the AI chat interface.
Verify that all chat entries and AI responses are saved and displayed in the chat history.
Logout and then login again with the same user.
Verify that the previously saved chat history loads and is displayed correctly.
Refresh the chat page.
Verify chat history persists and displays correctly.

title: Subscription Pricing Page - Display and Selection
description: Verify that the pricing UI correctly displays subscription plans, pricing details, and allows plan selection.

steps.description: Navigate to the Pricing page as an authenticated user.
Verify that all subscription plans are displayed with correct pricing and features.
Select a subscription plan.
Verify the selection is highlighted and ready for payment.

title: Subscription Payment - Successful Payment Flow
description: Verify the payment process via Paymob integration successfully completes and updates user subscription status.

steps.description: Navigate to the payment page after selecting a plan.
Enter valid payment information and submit transaction.
Verify payment is processed successfully and confirmation is shown.
Verify backend updates subscription status and unlocks user access accordingly.
Verify payment callback is received and handled correctly by the server via webhook.

title: Subscription Payment - Payment Failure Handling
description: Verify the system handles payment failures gracefully and provides appropriate user feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to the payment page after selecting a plan.
Attempt payment with invalid or declined payment details.
Verify user is shown an appropriate payment failure message.
Verify subscription status remains unchanged and no access is granted.
Verify the payment failure callback webhook updates system state accordingly.

title: n8n Workflow Automation - Chat Request Processing
description: Verify that chat inputs trigger n8n webhook workflows correctly and that workflows execute without errors.

steps.description: Submit a chat prompt in the AI chat interface.
Verify the request triggers the n8n webhook.
Verify the n8n workflow executes successfully and the AI response is generated and returned.
Verify no errors occur in the workflow execution logs.

title: n8n Workflow Automation - Payment Event Handling
description: Verify that payment events trigger n8n webhook workflows correctly and workflows update user subscriptions or system state appropriately.

steps.description: Complete a subscription payment.
Verify the payment webhook triggers the n8n workflow.
Verify the workflow executes without errors and updates user subscription access status.

title: Marketing Site - Responsive Layout Verification
description: Verify that all marketing pages (Home, About, Capabilities, Contact, Legal) render correctly and maintain usability across desktop and mobile devices.

steps.description: Access each marketing page on a desktop browser.
Verify all page elements render correctly with no layout breaks.
Resize browser window to typical mobile screen dimensions or use real mobile devices.
Verify pages maintain responsive layouts and usability with no content overlapping or cutoffs.

title: Marketing Site - Performance and Accessibility Audit
description: Verify that marketing site pages pass standard performance and accessibility audits.

steps.description: Run performance audit tools (e.g., Lighthouse) on marketing pages.
Verify performance scores meet acceptable thresholds.
Run accessibility audit tools on marketing pages.
Verify accessibility issues are resolved or minimal and pages conform to WCAG guidelines.

title: Route Protection - Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that protected routes cannot be accessed by unauthenticated users and redirect correctly to authentication pages.

steps.description: Attempt to access chat and payment pages while logged out.
Verify user is redirected to login or registration page.
Login successfully.
Access protected pages.
Verify access is granted.

title: JWT Session Management - Validity and Expiration Handling
description: Verify that JWT tokens are properly issued on login, stored securely, validated on protected routes, and expire correctly to end user sessions.

steps.description: Login and capture JWT token.
Verify token is stored securely in client (e.g., HttpOnly cookie or secure storage).
Access protected routes with a valid token.
Verify access is granted.
Simulate token expiration by waiting or manipulating expiry.
Verify user is logged out or redirected to login on expired token usage.
